name: room1temp
format:
<script src="/myjs/tween-min.js"></script>
<script src="/myjs/steelseries-min.js"></script>
<script>
var radial1;
    (function(scope){ 
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
           if (typeof(msg.temp) != "undefined") radial1.setValueAnimated(msg.temp);
           if (typeof(msg.coolsetpnt) != "undefined") radial1.setThreshold(msg.coolsetpnt);
           if (typeof(msg.heatsetpnt) != "undefined") radial1.setThreshold(msg.heatsetpnt);
           if (typeof(msg.tempname) != "undefined") radial1.setTitleString(msg.tempname);
           if (typeof(msg.userLed) != "undefined") radial1.setUserLedOnOff(msg.userLed);  
           if (typeof(msg.trend) != "undefined")
            {
                if (msg.trend==1)     radial1.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.UP);
                if (msg.trend==0)     radial1.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.STEADY);
                if (msg.trend==-1)    radial1.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.DOWN);
                if (msg.trend==-2)    radial1.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.OFF);
            }
        });
    })(scope);

    var sections = [steelseries.Section(10, 18, 'rgba(0, 0, 220, 0.3)'),
                        steelseries.Section(18, 24, 'rgba(0, 220, 0, 0.3)'),
                        steelseries.Section(24, 30, 'rgba(220, 0, 0, 0.3)') ],

            // Define one area
    areas = [steelseries.Section(18, 24, 'rgba(80, 220, 100, 0.3)')],
    
    radial1 = new steelseries.Radial('canvasradial1', {
            gaugeType: steelseries.GaugeType.TYPE2,
            minValue: 10,
            maxValue: 30,
            size: 235,
            section: sections,
            area: areas,
            unitString: "Degrees C",
            threshold: 22,
            thresholdRising: false,
            userLedVisible: false,
            ledVisible: false,
            useOdometer: false,
            lcdVisible: true,
            lcdDecimals: 1,
            trendVisible: false
        });
                        
    radial1.setFrameDesign(steelseries.FrameDesign.BLACK_METAL);
    radial1.setValueAnimated(0);
    radial1.blinkUserLed(0);
    radial1.setOdoValue(0);


</script>

<canvas id="canvasradial1" width="401" height="401"></canvas>

name: controller_temp
format:
<script src="/myjs/tween-min.js"></script>
<script src="/myjs/steelseries-min.js"></script>
<script>
var radial7;
    (function(scope){ 
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
           if (typeof(msg.temp) != "undefined") radial7.setValueAnimated(msg.temp);
           if (typeof(msg.coolsetpnt) != "undefined") radial7.setThreshold(msg.coolsetpnt);
           if (typeof(msg.heatsetpnt) != "undefined") radial7.setThreshold(msg.heatsetpnt);
           if (typeof(msg.userLed) != "undefined") radial7.setUserLedOnOff(msg.userLed);  
           if (typeof(msg.trend) != "undefined")
            {
                if (msg.trend==1)     radial7.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.UP);
                if (msg.trend==0)     radial7.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.STEADY);
                if (msg.trend==-1)    radial7.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.DOWN);
                if (msg.trend==-2)    radial7.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.OFF);
            }
        });
    })(scope);

    var sections = [steelseries.Section(10, 18, 'rgba(0, 0, 220, 0.3)'),
                        steelseries.Section(18, 24, 'rgba(0, 220, 0, 0.3)'),
                        steelseries.Section(24, 30, 'rgba(220, 0, 0, 0.3)') ],

            // Define one area
    areas = [steelseries.Section(18, 24, 'rgba(80, 220, 100, 0.3)')],
    
    radial7 = new steelseries.Radial('canvasradial7', {
            gaugeType: steelseries.GaugeType.TYPE2,
            minValue: 10,
            maxValue: 30,
            size: 235,
            section: sections,
            area: areas,
            titleString: "Controller",
            unitString: "Degrees C",
            threshold: 22,
            thresholdRising: false,
            userLedVisible: false,
            ledVisible: false,
            useOdometer: false,
            lcdVisible: true,
            lcdDecimals: 1,
            trendVisible: false
        });
                        
    radial7.setFrameDesign(steelseries.FrameDesign.BLACK_METAL);
    radial7.setValueAnimated(0);
    radial7.blinkUserLed(0);
    radial7.setOdoValue(0);


</script>

<canvas id="canvasradial7" width="401" height="401"></canvas>

name: table recorder
